channel.title: JUICE - Sexy Funky House Music UK
channel.description:
Oozing style & sophistication in abundance with a splash of class & charisma all neatly hand-crafted in to one elegant package full of the finest musical ingredients.
Simply put: House music at it's finest. Funky, sexy & stylish.
It's all about House music!
channel.itunes:subtitle: 'It's all about House music'
channel.itunes:author: Max Corderoy

item.title: Juice 30 : Plump DJs Guest Mix
item.description: In this edition you can expect the usual driving house music consisting of tracks that have been destroying many a dancefloor for me in recent months & a couple tracks that simply never grow old! The last half an hour is fronted by global mega-stars; Plump DJs. Being early pioneers of the breakbeat genre, the Plump DJs have diversified in recent years to incorporate new styles such as electro, house & bass music. Their sound is still widely thought to maintain a breakbeat aesthetic, but their productions and DJ sets have become stylistically broader. Their live guest mix pretty much epitomizes this notion! In 2010, the Plump DJs began releasing material on new London-based label Grand Hotel. Be sure to check the guys out here http://www.plumpdjs.co.uk/ Enjoy! Max :) p.s You can catch me playing for the next TRIBES event at The White House, London next Friday 26th August: Tracklisting for the show: 1. Emil Croff - This Is My House (Club Mix) 2. Nic Fanciulli - Cat Out Of The Bag (Jim Rivers Cat Nip Remix) 3. Oliver S - Doin' Ya Thing 4. Jose Nunez ft. Shawnee Taylor - Yesterday 5. Yasmeen & Danism - Rise (Main Mix) 6. Richard Dinsdale, Sam Obernik & Hook N Sling - Edge Of The Earth 7. Haji & Emanuel - Weekend (Marco Lys Remix) 8. Stonebridge - Put 'em High 9. Andrew Bennett - Playroom 10. Mark Knight - The Future 11. Anil Chawla - Roc /// Plump DJs /// 1. 30 Minute Live Guest Mix

item.title: Juice 29
item.description: Hello All.. With more groove than George Benson's entire back catalogue, your weekend warm-up has arrived! In just over a month Juice 28 has received 40000 downloads & 11000 plays on the player so big up to everyone that supported it! At the heart of Juice 29 is a healthy dose of driving, groovy, melodic house music; including 2 awesome Mark Knight productions, a remix of the 70's disco anthem 'Boogie Wonderland', a big room take on the 1990 classic 'C&C Music Factory - Gonna Make You Sweat' & some of the usual suspects. Enjoy! Max :) p.s You can catch me playing for the next TRIBES event at The White House, London next Friday 27th May: http://on.fb.me/TRIBES-TheWhiteHouse-27-05-11 Tracklisting for the show: 1. Kid Massive - Music Is The Answer 2. Sean Miller & Daniel Dubb - Sinnerman 3. Kevin Andrews & Leisuregroove - Everybody Dance 4. Mark Knight - Yalta Groove 5. Sergio Fernandez - Game Over 6. Earth Wind & Fire - Boogie Wonderland (Belocca & Soneec Remix) 7. Mark Knight vs. Florence & The Machine - You've Got The Love 8. Alex Kenji Vs Federico Scavo - Get Funky 9. Stonebridge & Chris Kaeser - Rescue Me 10. Diddy - Dirty Money - Hello Good Morning (Erick Morillo & Eddie Thoneick Mix) 11. Scot Project & Supermusique! - Do You Want Me (Lazy Rich Remix)

item.title: Juice 28 : Bargrooves Edition - with Max Corderoy & Ben Sowton
item.description: Hello folks.. As the summer draws near.. it's only fitting to provide you with some laid back grooves, in the form of a special 'Bargrooves Edition' podcast. For the first hour i've hand selected 11 classic scorchers; any more laid back.. they'd fall over! Taking you into the second hour is Ben Sowton. Ben, who is the creator of the Seamless Recordings label, can rightly lay claim to kick starting the trend for bar/cocktail inspired compilation albums that is sweeping across continents. Ben created the legandary Bargrooves series, as a consequence of being involved in the club scene through underground house parties & setting up one of London’s most successful clubs, The White House. http://www.seamlessrecordings.com http://www.thewhitehouselondon.co.uk/ Nowadays, Ben soley concentrates on the running of The White House & his Seamless Recording label, in which he elegantly represents in the second hour with a selection of tracks from his forthcoming CD compilation 'Best Of Funky House Anthems Vol.2' http://bit.ly/BestOfFunkyHouseAnthemsVol2 Enjoy! Max p.s You can catch me playing for the next TRIBES event at The White House, London in a couple weeks on Friday 22nd April: http://on.fb.me/TRIBES-TheWhiteHouse-22-04-11 Tracklisting for the show: 1. Max Corderoy - Calm Before The Storm 2. Tim Deluxe - Battle 3. Physics & Thaisoul - 7 A.M Sessions (Thaisoul Sunrise Mix) 4. Kloud 9 - So Many Reasons (Reel People Mix) 5. Wez Clarke & Maxine Hardcastle Feat. The Lovely Laura on Sax - Another Chance (Richard Earnshaw Mix) 6. Thelma Houston - I Need Somebody Tonight (Joey Negro Zone Mix) 7. The Keith Thompson Project - Rhythm Of Life (Jazz-N-Groove Dub) 8. Kings Of Tomorrow - Finally (Joey Negro Remix) 9. Groove Armada - Love Sweet Sound (Mark Knight & Funkagenda Mix) 10. Sandy Rivera - Changes 11. Solu Music Feat Kimblee - Fade (Grant Nelson Big Room Vocal Mix) Ben Sowton 1 . DJ Bhokero & DJ Dey Ft. Tasita D´Mour - Get On Up (Original Club Mix) 2 . Autosoul feat. Madeleine Kate - Crazy 4 U (Rhythm Slaves Mix) 3 . Distant People - Sounds Of Love (Soularis Mix) 4 . JazzLoungerz Ft. Johanna Olarte - Amor (Jonny Montana & Craig Stewart Mix)5 . Soularis - Closer (Original) 6 . HawaBiza Project - Animal (Original Vocal Mix) 7 . Groove Assassin Ft. Mina Jackson - Feel Good Muzik (Souldynamic Vocal Mix) 8 . Justin Michael & Phonic Funk Ft. Maiya - My Destination (M-Sol Mix) 9 . Jazzloungerz & Headtrip Feat Lu Chase - Loveblind (Central Avenue Remix) 10 . Moses McClean feat Rob Burns - Love Thing (Jay J Shifted Up Mix)

item.title: Juice 27 : Dom Makin Guest Mix
item.description: Happy 2011 to you all! Keeping the consistency as sporadic as ever.. Juice is back in fine form. The 27th edition includes tracks you may already be well acquainted with in their original form but in true Juice fashion, they've been amalgamated into one delicious house treat for you all :) Going into extra time on this occasion is Dom Makin, head honcho of one of the biggest house nights in London; TRIBES. Since coming into fruition 5 years ago, TRIBES has been at the forefront of the London house scene with regular nights at The White House & Inigo, to name a couple. Dom himself, has a DJ resume as long as the eye can see & continues to deliver sensational nights in the SW1 region to all his faithful followers. You can catch Dom Makin & myself DJing for the next TRIBES event at The White House, London this weekend on Saturday 29th January: http://on.fb.me/TRIBES-TheWhiteHouse-29-01-11-EventPage /// http://www.tribesuk.com Enjoy! :) Max Tracklisting for the show: 1. Daft Punk - High Life (Felix Leiter's Digital Edit) 2. Olav Basoski - Pop 3. Stretch & Vern - I'm Alive 2010 (Louis La Roche Remix) 4. Hi Tack - Say Say Say (Waiting 4 U) (The Caramel Club Remix) 5. Les Schmitz & Alex Del Amo - We Are Family 6. Sandy Rivera & Rae - Hide U (Sandy Rivera's Club Mix) 7. Eric Tyrell feat. Lana Gordon - Love Goes Around The World (Plastik Funk Remix) 8. Sergio Flores - Give It Back (Big Acid Mix) 9. Axwell - Watch The Sunrise (Prok & Fitch & Patric La Funk Bootleg) 10. Malfankson - Intro & Ending (Something Good Remix) 11. Basto! - Gregory's Theme (Extended Mix) 12. Nalin & Kane - Beachball (Chris Lake Remix) 13. Deadmau5 - Sofi Needs A Ladder (Extended Mix) /// Dom Makin Guest Mix /// 1. The White Stripes - 7 Nation Army (Felix Leiter's Digital Edit) 2. Bastian Van Shield - Billie Was Here (Umek & Jay Lumen Remix) 3. Kruse & Nuernberg - Lovers n Fighters - (DJ Madskillz Remix) 4. Ellrich & Plaice - Bittersweet  5  Tocadisco & Afrojack - Tequila Sunrise 6. Jesse Garcia - Off Da Hook 7. SHM - Show One Love (Hardwell Remix) 8. Dirty South vs Faithless - Let It Go Insomnia 9. Ticon - Jinxed (Christian Smith Remix) 10. Dub Deluxe - It's Been Done 11. Avicii - Malo (Sgt Slick Remix) 12. Max Vangeli, AN21# - Swedish Beauty

item.title: Juice 26
item.description: As it's only 9 weeks until Christmas, i thought i'd treat you all to an early Xmas present! Juice 26 is as sprightly as ever; enriched with the finest in funky house music, with a small sprinkling of dirtiness towards the end ;) Artists like Deadmau5, Swedish House Mafia, Chris Lake, Erick Morillo & the soon to be huge Wolfgang Gartner are leading the way in this edition so all that's left to say...is... Enjoy! :) Tracklisting for the show: 1. Ivan Pica - Freak Out (Max Corderoy's Cheeky Intro Mix) 2. Sebastien Drums & Avicii - My Feeling For You 3. Ruff Loaderz & The Cut Up Boys - Music Sounds Better With You (eSQUIRE Mix) 4. A.L.B.A - Good Vibrations (Belmond & Parker Remix) 5. Chris Lake & Marco Lys - Cross The Line (Main Club Mix) 6. Junior Jack - My Feeling (Incognet Remix) 7. Swedish House Mafia & Laidback Luke - Leave The World Behind (Incognet Remix) 8. Markus Binapfl & Erick Morillo - Alive (Mikael Weermets & Johan Wedel Remix) 9. Deadmau5 & Wolfgang Gartner - Animal Rights 10. Cut & Splice - Old Skool Nu Skool Vol.2 11. Wolfgang Gartner - Ill America For those of you in the vicinity at least, i'll be playing at INIGO in LONDON on the 30th October for TRIBES. It's set to be a huge Halloween party with all the thrills & spills of a great house night! So if you fancy coming along, let me know! Here's the event page: http://on.fb.me/TRIBES-InigoHalloweenParty-London

item.title: Juice 25 : Bimbo Jones Guest Mix
item.description: 5 years on & 2 million downloads later Juice has finally reached episode number 25! I was hoping the 25th edition would be the recording of my set at The White House in London on Saturday but as that wasn't possible i've hand-picked the highlights of that very set along with a couple timeless classics & a selection of fresh, unseasoned, funkers to compliment a Guest Mix which is equally as uplifting. The last 30 minutes comes from UK dance outfit Bimbo Jones, comprising of Lee Dagger, Marc JB & vocalist Katherine Ellis. Known for turning popular chart-toppers into dancefloor-destroyers, they possess a back catalogue as long as ones arm, remixing for the likes of Lady Gaga, Britney Spears, Usher, Pink & most recently the one & only JLS. Be sure to check them out here: http://www.bimbojones.com/ Enjoy! :) Max JOIN THE JUICE FACEBOOK GROUP HERE: http://bit.ly/JuiceFacebookGroup You'll find my up coming gigs, as well as being able to keep up to date with each episode as it happens. If you've got any friends that are partial to a bit of funkiness, feel free to invite them to join this group by clicking the 'invite people to join' link under the group picture. Tracklisting for the show: 1. Twisted Society - Sign Your Name 2010 (Classic House Extended) 2. Rosie Gaines - I Want You (Soulmakers Remix) 3. Cloudburst Feat. Culture Girl - 40 Miles Vocal Mix) 4. StoneBridge - You Don't Know (Hott 22 Remix) 5. Jason Chance - Head Shake 6. Miss Babayaga DJ & DJ Josh Blackwell - Professional Widow 7. The Ones Vs. DJ Red & Josh Dupont - Flawless 2010 8. F. Physical - Fleck 9. Farina & Benedetto - I'm Getting Ready (Hott 22 Remix) 10. Mikael Weermets - I'll House U (Vocal Mix) 11. Pryda - Niton /// Bimbo Jones Guest Mix /// 1. Redroche & Olav Basoski ft. Amanda Wilson - Not Over You 2. Cut & Splice - The Predator 3. Martijn ten Velden vs Red Carpet - Together Alright (MTVs 2010 Club Mix) 4. Tiësto vs Diplo - C'Mon 5. Robbie Rivera - Rock The Disco (Laidback Luke Remix) 6. Steve Angello & Laidback Luke - Be vs Satisfaction (Swedish House Mafia Bootleg) 7. Tim Berg - Bromance (Bimbo Jones Remix)

item.title: Juice 24 : Chris Lake Guest Mix
item.description: Juice 24 has been served up & is ready to be polished off by you, the delightful listener ;) In this edition you'll be treated to the likes of Seamus Haji, ATFC, Mark Knight, Axwell & EDX with a 30 minute guest mix from a guy that needs no intro: Chris Lake. He's been personally responsible for sending shivers down many a spine, including mine, with personal favourites like 'Changes' & 'Carry Me Away'. It isn't just the fluffy stuff he's adept at producing, it's the filthy, downright dirty beats he's equally known for. You can catch the man himself at Sankeys in Manchester this weekend & Cream: Amnesia the next. Pop over to his Fan Page to check out all his latest comings & goings. Enjoy! :) Max JOIN THE JUICE FACEBOOK GROUP HERE: http://bit.ly/JuiceFacebookGroup You'll find my up coming gigs, as well as being able to keep up to date with each episode as it happens. If you've got any friends that are partial to a bit of funkiness, feel free to invite them to join this group by clicking the 'invite people to join' link under the group picture. Tracklisting for the show: 1. Eric Prydz vs Addy Van Der Zwan & Koen Groeneveld - Gotta Move The Pjanoo (Max Corderoy Mash-Up) 2. Dimitri Vegas & Like Mike & Dada Life - Tomorrow (Sarah Main & John Voltaire Remix) 3. Seamus Haji & Romain Curtis - Just A Friend 4. Jerry Ropero & Tom Novy - Don't Lie (Seb Drums & Rob Adams Remix) 5. Paul Deighton & Richard Murray - Dont Lie (Vision Factory Remix) 6. Thomas Gold & Lee Cabrera - Shake It (Terrace Vocal Mix) 7. EDX - Thrive (EDX's Fe5tival Mix) 8. Sons Of Maria - Touch Me 9. ATFC - Bring The Beat Back 10. Mark Knight - Conscindo 11. Red Carpet feat. Hardwell - Alright (2010 Remix) 12. Axwell - Nothing But Love (Remode Mix) ///Chris Lake Guest Mix/// 1. Chris Lake Vs Night Riders - Love that Sound 2. Crazibiza - Spinning Around - Tommy Boy Remix 3. Chris Lake And Nelski - Minimal Life (DJ PP Remix) 4. NDKj - Funkiest Star (Marshall Remix) 5. Round Table Knights - Stomper 6. Kolombo, Kagomba - Kagomba (Andhim Remix) 7. Pete Gooding, James Doman - Oosa

item.title: Juice 23 : Junior Jack & Kid Crème Guest Mix
item.description: Yes it's like buses, you wait ages for one, then two come by at once! If you like your house music with a twist, you're in for a treat! Think Miami WMC, think Beach Stage at Global Gathering.. that's where the 23rd edition of Juice aims to take you with the likes of Mark Knight, Eric Morillo, Hardsoul & a cheeky little mash-up from myself ;) Carrying on from the theme of the last episode, I'm proud to welcome two heavy-weights to the Juice Guest Mix slot: Mr Vito Lucento & Mr Nicolas Scaravilli, better known as Junior Jack & Kid Crème. Whether solo or as a partnership, they've both been responsible for some of the biggest house anthems to date with tracks like 'Stupidisco', 'My Feeling', 'E-Samba' 'Da Hype' & 'Doing My Own Thing' all being smash hits. They'll be providing you with 30 minutes of latino-infused, big-room house. For more info on Junior Jack & Kid Crème, head over to their respective MySpace pages: http://www.myspace.com/juniorjack http://www.myspace.com/kidcreme If you'd like to see the guys in the flesh, they'll be playing for a night going from strength to strength, New City Sound in Bristol UK on the 30th May. For more details visit their site at http://www.newcitysound.co.uk Enjoy! :) Max Tracklisting for the show: 1. Junior Jack - Thrill Me (Such A Thrill) (Erick Morillo Vocal Mix) 2. Passenger 10 - Needles & Pins 3. Mark Knight & D.Ramirez Vs Underworld - Downpipe 4. Doman & Gooding Vs DJ Slider - Seven Pacific (Max Corderoy Mash-Up) 5. Boris Rush - Beaches 6. Belocca & Soneec - Bla Bla (Martijn Ten Velden Remix) 7. Olivier Giacomotto - Back Down (Save The Robot Remix) 8. Joan Reyes - Shakedown (Bass Kleph Remix) 9. Hardsoul feat. Fierce Ruling Diva - Self Religion (Mark Knight Remix) 10. Eddie Thoneick & Erick Morillo feat. Shena - Nothing Better 11. Kid Crème - The Game (Kid's Piano Mix) /// Junior Jack & Kid Crème Guest Mix ///

item.title: Juice 21
item.description: Juice is back in business! You can now remove that Juice-patch again.. it's time to ease those withdrawal symptoms as Juice number 21 is now available for download. The Michael Jackson Tribute Mix back in July has been downloaded a massive 90,000+ times which goes to show what a true inspiration he was to many & owing partly to the great man himself, the podcast reached dizzy heights in the iTunes podcast chart, peaking at Number 3, just below the Radio 1 Chart Show & above over 200,000 other podcasts! Juice 21 is another journey through music Utopia... Entering through the golden gates, you'll be taken on a paradisiacal path to a world where Sexy Funky House Music is the holy grail! As usual let me know what you think, spread the word & above all... Enjoy! :) Max Tracklisting for the show: 1. Danny Clark & Jay Benham feat. SuSu Bobien - Wondrous (ATFC's Lectrotek Vocal Mix) 2. Jonni Black Vs Shena - Take Me Higher (Original Vocal Mix) 3. Hott 22 - Something Real 4. Jay C & Shena - The Music 5. Samantha James - Breathe You In (Eric Kupper Remix) 6. Whelan & Di Scala Feat. Nikki Belle - Sunset To Sunrise (Hott 22 Remix) 7. ATFC - Tell U Y (New Jack Swing Original Mix) 8. Joey Negro - Must Be The Music (Nicola Fasano Remix) 9. Deep Swing - In The Music (Christian Marchi Remix) 10. Cassian - Friday Night 11. Cassian - Final Round

item.title: Michael Jackson : Tribute Mix
item.description: I don't know about you but when i heard the horrible news on Thursday night my heart sank & ever since it's hit me hard having to accept the fact that Michael Jackson isn't around anymore. Needless to say i'm a huge fan of his music but as we all realize, his music will live on, in fact Mj's tracks still sound as fresh as ever & i'm sure that'll be the case in 100 years from now. It's just the fact that Michael Jackson stood for a lot of positive things & in a way, was a God-like figure to a lot of people all around the globe. In my opinion he was hounded by the press until the day he died but whatever your thoughts on MJ are, 99% of people all agree on 1 thing, he is the King of Pop & maybe even the King of Music. So as my own personal tribute to the legend that is Michael Jackson, here is a special Juice-Infused, MJ-filled, Funkathon-Mix for you to download & 'remember the time'.... 'Enjoy Yourself' :) p.s Don't forget to join the Juice Facebook Group : http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=63790530514 Tracklisting for the Mix: 1. Michael Jackson vs Mylo - Drop Me Bad 2. Michael Jackson - Don't Stop Till You Get Enough (MAW Remix) 3. Michael Jackson - Rock With You (Freemasons Bootleg Mix) 4. The Jackson 5 - ABC (Freemasons Bootleg Mix) 5. The Sound Bluntz - Billie Jean (Beat Mix) 6. Soul Avengerz - Enjoy Yourself (Off The Wall) 7. Michael Jackson - Thriller (Eric Prydz Bootleg Mix) 8. Michael Jackson - Remember The Time (Virtual Groove Remix) 9. Beatfreakz - Somebody's Watching Me (Ian Carey Remix) 10. Redd Angel - Man In The Mirror

item.title: Juice 20
item.description: The big 20 has arrived! In this edition i treat you to a 77 minute mix recorded live at 'The White House' in London, where i DJed on the 30th May for a night called 'Tribes' (run by Dom Makin). It was a great night, the atmosphere was electric, which i suppose inspired the artwork i made to accompany the episode ;) The peak-time set is full of what you've come to expect from the podcast with some rather encompassing, chunky kicks that you probably won't expect. Funky, uplifting & melodic are once again perfect words to describe the flow & energy of the mix... so all that's left for you to do now is, download &... Enjoy! :) p.s As usual don't forget to invite your friends to the 'Juice Facebook Group' : http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=63790530514 Tracklisting for the show: 1. Jorgensen Vs BSD - I Don't Care (Deadmau5 Remix) [N.E.W.S.] 2. Passenger 10 - Mirage (EDX 5un5hine Remix) [Unreleased Digital] 3. Albin Myers - Times Like These (Edx's Redub) [PinkStar Records] 4. Faithless featuring Cass Fox - Music Matters (Mark Knight Remix) [Toolroom Records] 5. ATFC Featuring Lisa Millett - Bad Habit (ATFC's Classic Re-Mixed) [Defected] 6. Golden Girls - Kinetic (Prok & Fitch Golden Shower Remix) [Floorplay Music] 7. Cevin Fisher ft. Loletta Holloway - You Got Me Burning Up (Prok & Fitch Remix) [Subversive] 8. Richard Grey & Erick Morillo - Life Goes On (Richard Grey 2008 Mix) [D:vision Records] 9. Dimitri Vegas & Like Mike vs Pryda & Underworld - Work That Slippy Pjanoo [Bootleg] 10. Nightcrawlers - Push The Feeling On (Robbie Rivera's Juicy Ibiza Mix) [Stealth Records (UK)] 11. Paul Keeley - Doormatica [Anjunadeep] 12. Steve Angello & Laidback Luke - Show Me Love (Hardwell & Sunrise Remix) [Happy Music] 13. Paul Van Dyk - For An Angel (Dave Darell Remix) [High Contrast Recordings] 14. Sunfreakz feat Andrea Briton - Counting Down The Days (Axwell Remix) [Oxyd Records]

Lots of cool vocal tracks in this one as well, so be sure to get those vocal cords warmed up beforehand! Don't forget to head on over to Facebook & join the Juice Facebook Group, where you can keep up-to-date on all future episodes: http://www.facebook.com/home.php?#/group.php?gid=63790530514&ref=ts Enjoy! :) Tracklisting for the show: 1. On the menu for the latest treat, there's more soul-drenched vocals, dripping with tight energetic bass-lines & heart-warming melodies! WARNING: MUST BE PLAYED AT HIGH VOLUME! Here is the 3rd & last in the series of the hugely popular Funk In Ur Sole. This episode gives you everything from soul-kissed, sunshine beats to darker edged basslines... As usual there's always that one ingredient that remains.. & thats the funk! item.title: Juice 14 : Funk In Ur Sole
item.description: It's all gone a bit electro recently & i feel it's about time to steady the ship a bit & bring back the funk in house music with some soul-drenched vocals & special house anthems to lighten the spirit. Don't be fooled though, the energy is still there, which builds from start to finish & the melodies are as uplifting as ever! Enjoy! p.s Leave a comment, become a fan... spread the word! :) Tracklisting for the show: 1. Universal Love - Ritmo De Rua (Brian Tappert Prime Time Vibe) 2. Cleptomaniacs vs Stevie Wonder - All I Do 3. Tim Deluxe feat. Sam Obernik - It Just Won't Do (Milk & Sugar Mix) 4. Blake Reary - Step It Up (Richard Earnshaw Mix) 5. Major Boys feat. Kathy Brown - Time And Time Again (Hott 22 Main Vocal) 6. DJ Wady - I Want You (Hott 22 Mix) 7. We Deliver - Breath Again (Shapeshifters Mix) 8. Chris Lake vs Kings of Tomorrow - Finally Changes 9. Red Carpet - Alright (Brad Carter Mix) - Classic Tune - 10. Soulsearcher - Can't Get Enough

item.title: Juice 13
item.description: Bonjour Amigos... The 13th installment of your favourite sexy house podcast is ready for download. There's some great tracks around at the moment & here's a selection of some of the tunes that are making a regular appereance in my DJ box. This set requires full volume as the beats are tough & the vibe is most definitely groovey so... Enjoy! p.s If you enjoyed this mix or the podcast in general then feel very welcome to Leave A Comment! 500+ downloads a day but i'm not getting enough love! Tracklisting for the show: 1. Corderoy - You 2. Infernal - From Paris To Berlin (Hoxton Whores Mix) 3. Strike - You Sure Do (Eric Smax & Thomas Gold Mix) 4. Robot Needs Oil - Volta (Giacomotto Mix) 5. Dubfire - Roadkill 6. Arno Cost & Arias vs Robin S - Show Me Magenta 7. Daft Punk - Harder Faster Stronger (Deadmau5 Mix) 8. Super Mai - Bigger Than Big (Lifelike Mix) 9. Roisin Murphy - Overpowered (Seamus Haji Mix) 10. Weekend Masters vs Shena - I've Found The Love (Sharooz Mix) 11. Delacy - Hideaway (Rhythm Code & Chris Lake Mix)

item.title: Juice presents: Mash-Up Mix
item.description:
*SPECIAL EDITION*

Another edition of Juice is here but not as you might expect. This is the second Special Edition Juice in the form of some rare mash-up funky, party anthems.

There's a big mixture of tracks in this set from the 80's & 90's pop to some more recent commercial house & RnB so get downloading!... Enjoy! p.s Email me at djmaxcords@hotmail.com! Tracklisting for the show: 1. Pattie LaBelle vs BeeGees - Lady Marmalade Should Be Dancin 2. Danni vs Dead Or Alive - Begin To Spin Me Around 3. Khia vs Micheal Gray - Weekend Pussy 4. Akon vs DJ Delicious - Smack That Rockin' 5. Sean Paul vs Double 99 - Blazin' Ripgroove 6. Camisra vs Madonna - Let Me Show You A Holiday 7. Bodyrox vs Ludacras - Yeah When I Move 8. David Guetta vs Studio B - The Egg Sees Girls 9. Mylo vs Miami Sound Machine - Conga Pressure 10. Bucketheads Vs. Lonnie Gordon - The Bomb's Gonna Catch You 11. Jamelia vs Kylie Monogue - Real Things Spinning Around 12. Whitney Houston vs Black Rock - It's Not Right But It's OK

item.title: Juice 12
item.description: Juice 12 is here... Tough, phat basslines with a funky vibe is the topic for this podcast. We start off with a few really funky numbers to get you in the groove, getting a bit more serious when Hoxton Whore's remix of the classic Infernal sets the trend for the rest of the set. By the time you reach Dirty South's remix of another all-time classic from Depeche Mode, you'll be screaming for some uplifting energy to wash down those electro beats & what better way to serve you, than with Arno Costs stunning remix of Nicole Otero's Sunshine Song. It doesn't stop there though coz be prepared for 4 of the biggest tunes around at the moment, all massive in their own right, to finish you off!.. Enjoy! Tracklisting for the show: 1. Eclipse - Makes Me Love (Sunset Mix) 2. Freemasons - I Feel Like 3. Doc Da Funk - Real Love 4. Infernal - From Paris To Berli (Hoxton Whores Mix) 5. Dirty South & Paul Harris - Better Day (TV Rock Mix) 6. TV Rock vs Dukes Of Windsor - The Others (Dirty South Mix) 7. Depeche Mode - Jus't Can't Get Enough (Dirty South Mix) 8. Nicole Otero - Sunshine Song (Arno Cost Mix) 9. Paul Van Dyk - White Lies (Dave Spoon Mix) 10. David Guetta - Love Is Gone 11. Daft Punk - Harder Faster Stronger (Deadmau5 Mix) 12. The Freaks - The Creeps (Vandilism Vocal Mix)

item.title: Juice 11
item.description: Need more Juice? Ok here's the 11th edition. There's some real large tunes in this set. We've got brand new tracks from Faithless, Groove Armada, Calvin Harris & Meck, so an 80's retro funk feel is all too evident! Enjoy! Tracklisting for the show: 1. Daft Punk - High Life 2. Calvin Harris - The Girls 3. Groove Armada - Get Down (Calvin Harris Mix) 4. Tom Novy - My House 5. Alan Braxe - Intro 6. The Similou - All This Love (Tonite Only Mix) 7. Eric Prydz - Boogie Sound 8. Rihanna - We Ride (Matronix Mix) 9. Mync Project - Something On Your Mind (Danny Freakazoid Mix) 10. Meck - Feels Like Home (TV Rock & Dirty South Mix) 11. Blu Ray - You & Me (Haji & Emanuel Mix) 12. Patrick L - Don't Stop The Music 13. Faithless - Music Matters (Axwell Mix) 14. Axwell Vs Dave Spoon - Feel The Sunrise

item.title: Juice 10
item.description: It's finally here... Juice 10 as promised is packed full of fresh funky house flavours, all in time for the summer! No filthy, dirty beats in this episode... this really is a podcast to listen to on the beach or anywhere where the sun is shining as the tenth edition is as bright & colourful as it gets! :) Enjoy! Tracklisting for the show: 1. Shakedown - At Night (Afterlife Mix) 2. Afro Medusa - Pasilda 3. Alibi vs Rockefeller - Sexual Healing (Freemasons Mix) 4. Whelan 7 Di Scala - Teardrops (Hott 22 Mix) 5. Cass Fox - Touch Me (Spencer & Hill Mix) 6. JoJo - Too Little Too Late (Paul Ricon Mix) 7. Gaelle - Give It Back (Grant Nelson Mix) 8. David Panda - Stepping Out (Party With Angels) 9. Brand New Heavies - I Don't Know Why (Haji & Emanuel Mix) 10. Jerry Ropero & Micheal Simon - Ocean Drums (Mischa Daniels Mix) 11. Alex Gaudina & Jerma - Waiting For Tonight 12. Sunfreakz feat Andrea Britton - Counting Down The Days 13. Black Rock vs W.Houston - Bluewater vs It's Not Right 14. Chris Lake - Carry Me Away 15. Jean Claude Ades - Fly Away 16. Roman Salzger - You Won't Change

item.title: Juice 9
item.description: Happy New Year! This is Juice 9.. ready to take up space on your computer in the politest possible way! As with the last Juice, there are some deeper sounds in this installment but still the usual sexy uplifting vibe, complimented by a mash-up of 2 classic uplifting house tunes to finish off with! Enjoy! Tracklisting for the show: 1. Fedde Le Grand - We Don't Take No Shhh 2. Hoxton Whores - Friday Saturday Love 3. Outwork - Electro (Cubeguys Dwlano Mix) 4. Pryda vs TBEP - Afterhumps 5. Wally Lopez - Don't You (Richard Grey Mix) 6. Raw Shape - Instant Groove 7. Josh The Funky 1 - Universal Sounds (Ian Carey Mix) 8. Sharam - PATT (Philippe B Mix) 9. David Guetta - Don't Let Me Go 10. Layo & Bushwack/Planet Funk - Love Story

item.title: Juice 8
item.description: Here is the long-awaited Juice 8. In this mix i've combined some real chunky sounds with the usual uplifting vibe. With M Factors driving bassline mix of Fatboy Slim's Champion Sound & Pryda's hypnotic monster, theres a bit of everything here for you to either lay back & appreciate or just warm up to before a night out!... Enjoy! p.s Dont forget to leave some feedback after you've listened! Tracklisting for the show: 1. Freeform Five - No More Conversations (Mylo Mix) (Champion Sound Acapella) 2. Sugababes - Easy (Haji & Emanuel Mix) 3. Fatboy Slim - Champion Sound (M Factor Mix) 4. Henrik B - Overrun 5. Pete Heller - Big Love (S.Lee & T.Cantrelle Re-Dub) 6. Maurice Noah vs DJ Phunk - Kraftgirl 7. Naughty Queen - Famous & Rich (Angello Mix) 8. Pryda - I Can't Remember 9. Sebastian Ingrosso - Body Beat (Angello Mix) 10. Who's Who - Sexy As Fuck 11. Deepgroove - Break Of Dawn (Mark Knight Piano Mix) 12. Sébastien Léger Feat Gia Melish - Hypnotized (Chris Lake Vocal Mix) (Champion Sound Acapella)

item.title: Juice 7
item.description: This is Juice 7... & as usual the tunes are freshly flowing for your musical pleasure. The energy is still bright & uplifting but theres a few dark areas in which to explore with this episode. Don't forget to check out my new Double CD Compilation : JUICE! Go to www.djmaxcords.podomatic.com to do just that! Tracklisting for the show : 1. ATFC - Spread Love 2. Meck - Thunder In My Heart (Hott 22 Mix) 3. Chanel - My Life (Fonzerelli Mix) 4. Firefox - Sex Shooter 5. The Young Punx - Young & Beautiful (Laurent Konrad Mix) 6. Roman Flugel - Gehts Noch (Angello Mix) 7. Mousse T vs The Dandy Warhols - Horny As A Dandy (T.Novy Mix) 8. Tom Novy - Take It (Haji & Emanuel Mix) 9. Big Bass - What You Do 10. Route 33 - Looking Back (Haji & Emanuel Mix) 11. Beyonce - Deja Vu (Freemasons Mix)

item.title: Juice 6
item.description: This is the 6th episode of Juice... the only podcast on the web to combine, energetic, uplifting fresh sounds with an original disco flavour! This installment has it all... from 70's, 80's, 90's & 00's (with a funky twist ofcourse) to brand new tunes & remixes! Enjoy! Tracklisting for the show : 1. Mochico - Say What You Want (Ian Carey Dub) 2. Steve Angello - Voices (Eric Prydz Mix) 3. Ian Carey - Nonstop 4. Black Fras - Moving Into Light (Freemasons Mix) 5. Loleatta Holloway - Love Sensation 06 6. Full Intention - Funky Town 7. Deep Dish - Say Hello (Angello & Ingrosso Mix) 8. Southside Hustlers - Right Before My Eyes (MK & MTV Mix) 9. Solitaire - You Got The Love (Soul Seekerz Mix) 10. Bob Sinclair - World Hold On 11. Kid Creme - The Game (Kid's Piano Mix)

item.title: Juice 5
item.description: Its here.. Juice 5 is upon us and ready to explode with full freshness, out of your speakers. This installment brings you bang up-to-date with some of the hottest tunes around at the moment. Feel-Good Funky Fresh Flava all for you... so Enjoy! To Download, left-click or right-click on the 'download' link below and choose 'save target as'. For Macs: hold control and click on the 'download' link and choose 'download linked file' Join my mailing list by clicking on the link at the top right of the page and get updates of forth-coming shows and cds! Tracklisting for the show : 1. Martin Solveig - Rocking Music 2. Faith Evans - Mesmerized (Freemasons Mix) 3. Freemasons - Watchin' 4. Lil' Love - Little Love (Soul Avengerz Mix) 5. Redd Angel - Man In The Mirror 6. Natural High - Live For One Day (Haji & Emanuel Mix) 7. Asle - Golden Sun (Haji & Emanuel Mix) 8. Silosonic - Something (To Make You Feel Alright) 9. Bodyrox - Yeah Yeah (Turbo House Mix) 10. Mayhem & Musaphia - Helps Me Thru 11. Shapeshifters - Incredible 12 Supermode - Tell Me Why (Axwell Mix)

item.title: Juice 4
item.description: Stop for some Juice, because here is the fourth Installment of Max Cords podcast show… ready for download and ready to give you another shot of Funky House inJUICEd flava. This set has a soulful edge with some big house to level it out. Email me for any questions etc as usual.. and once again... Enjoy! Tracklisting for the show : 1. Joey Negro - Make A Move On Me 2. Junior Jack - My Feelings 3. ATFC - Reach Out To Me 4. M - Gee ft. Mica Paris - Body Swerve 5. Liquid People - The Ice Cream Parlour 6. Kid Creme - Doing My Own Thing 7. Brandy -Full Moon (Full Intention Mix) 12. Hardsoul ft. Ron Carroll - Back Together

item.title: Juice 3
item.description: If you've been wearing that Juice-patch for over a month now, its time to take it off and feed those cravings with installment 3 of Max Cords show. Its been a hit in the states... lets make this a world-wide one! This set brings you a mixture of energetic and feel-good funky house... Enjoy! Tracklisting for the show : 1. Jay C - So High (Haji & Emanuel Mix) 2. Haji & Emanuel - Take Me Away 3. Soul Seekerz - Electric Shock 2005 4. Future Funk - Wildberry Tracks 5. M Factor - Come Together (Eric Prydz Mix) 6. Denis The Menace & Ropero - Time To Turn Around 11. Pharell - Angel (Axwell Mix)

item.title: Juice 2
item.description: Its that time again... installment 2 of Max Cords's Podcast Show. This set introduces a slightly more sophisticated edge to the agenda and gives you everything from MJ to Royksopp! Enjoy! Join my mailing list! or Email djmaxcords@hotmail.com to recieve tracklistings, if you want to recommend a tune or just ask a general question! Traclisting for the show : 1. Nu Rythmix - Babylon (Into A Groove) 2. Herd & Fitz - I Just Can't Get Enough 3. Axwell - Feel The Vibe (Seamus Haji Mix) 4. Eric Prydz - Slammin (Axwell Mix) 5.
